question: Display sci-fi movies and fantasy movies filmed in New Zealand.
sql_query1:
SELECT SciFiMovies.title
FROM SciFiMovies
WHERE SciFiMovies.filmingLocation = "New Zealand"
UNION
SELECT FantasyMovies.title
FROM FantasyMovies
WHERE FantasyMovies.filmingLocation = "New Zealand"
sql_query2:
SELECT SciFiMovies.title
FROM SciFiMovies
UNION
SELECT FantasyMovies.title
FROM FantasyMovies
WHERE FantasyMovies.filmingLocation = "New Zealand"
interpretation1: Can you show sci-fi movies and fantasy movies that were filmed in New Zealand?
interpretation2: List all sci-fi movies and also show fantasy movies filmed in New Zealand.
